feed.title: The Silent Developer
feed.subtitle: A website and blog where I discuss software projects I am working on, some of my interests, and my portfolio.

entry.title: Tome of Malice
entry.content: One of the projects I’ve been working on
entry.summary: One of the projects I’ve been working on

entry.title: Chronicles: Pt 1
entry.content:
One of the primary goals of this blog is to demonstrate progress on one of the RPG’s I have been working on. The main focus was to port the game to mobile, specifically iOS. Although writing the engine in Unity or Spritekit was my initial thought, this proved to be a bit daunting for a single person. Moreover, writing all this logic from nothing would have been exceedingly time consuming. This was when I discovered RPG Maker MV.

Here is an example of one of the battle sequences.
entry.summary: One of the primary goals of this blog is to demonstrate progress on one of the RPG’s I have been working on. The main focus was to port the game to mobile, specifically iOS. Although writing the engine in Unity or Spritekit was my initial thought, this proved to be a bit daunting for a single person. Moreover, writing all this logic from nothing would have been exceedingly time consuming. This was when I discovered RPG Maker MV.
